title: Shock Le Pen verdict rocks French far right
snippets: The far-right figurehead has been barred from running for public office for five years, throwing her plans into disarray.
summary: A far-right political figure has been banned from seeking any public office for a period of five years, disrupting her future political ambitions.
titles: Shock Le Pen verdict rocks French far right

title: BBC Verify: What satellite images reveal about Myanmar's quake
snippets: Myanmar's military government says at least 2,000 people were killed in last week's 7.7 magnitude quake.
summary: Myanmar's military government reported that a 7.7 magnitude earthquake last week resulted in at least 2,000 fatalities.
titles: BBC Verify: What satellite images reveal about Myanmar's quake

title: US says law applies to 'all parties' in Gaza
snippets: The deaths of 15 people including paramedics in a convoy have been blamed on Israel's military.
summary: Fifteen individuals, among them paramedics, were killed in a convoy, with responsibility attributed to the Israeli military.
titles: US says law applies to 'all parties' in Gaza

title: US deports more alleged gang members to El Salvador
snippets: Officials said 17 alleged criminals were deported despite a court order.
summary: Seventeen individuals, described as alleged criminals, were deported in violation of a court order, according to official statements.
titles: US deports more alleged gang members to El Salvador

title: Roof ripped off home as severe storms and tornadoes hit central US
snippets: Several states have been hit with heavy rain, hail and damaging winds, with storms expected to continue in some areas through Thursday.
summary: Several states are experiencing severe weather, including heavy rain, hail, and damaging winds. The storms are forecasted to persist in some regions until Thursday.
titles: Roof ripped off home as severe storms and tornadoes hit central US

title: Breaking down the 2025 McDonald's All American girls' game
snippets: Everything you need to know about the 2025 McDonald's All American girls' game on Tuesday (6:30 p.m. ET, ESPN2).
summary: The 2025 McDonald's All American girls' game is scheduled for Tuesday at 6:30 p.m. ET and will be broadcasted on ESPN2.
titles: Breaking down the 2025 McDonald's All American girls' game

title: Sources: Miles to forgo WNBA draft, enter portal
snippets: Following her team's exit in the Sweet 16 on Saturday, Notre Dame guard Olivia Miles has decided forgo the WNBA draft, despite being the projected as the No. 2 overall selection, and enter the transfer portal, sources told ESPN's Shams Charania on Monday.
summary: Notre Dame guard Olivia Miles, after her team was eliminated in the Sweet 16, has chosen to enter the transfer portal instead of joining the WNBA draft, where she was expected to be the No. 2 pick, according to ESPN's Shams Charania.
titles: Sources: Miles to forgo WNBA draft, enter portal

title: Braves' Profar gets 80-game ban for PED violation
snippets: Atlanta Braves outfielder Jurickson Profar was suspended for 80 games by Major League Baseball on Monday after a positive test for the performance-enhancing drug chorionic gonadotropin.
summary: Atlanta Braves outfielder Jurickson Profar has been suspended for 80 games by Major League Baseball due to testing positive for the performance-enhancing drug chorionic gonadotropin.
titles: Braves' Profar gets 80-game ban for PED violation

title: Texas wins to set up SEC Final Four clash vs. S.C.
snippets: No. 1 seed Texas wore down No. 2 TCU 58-47 in the Elite Eight on Monday night and now heads to the women's Final Four for the first time since 2003.
summary: The University of Texas women's basketball team, holding the No. 1 seed, defeated No. 2 seed TCU with a score of 58-47 in the Elite Eight on Monday night. This victory secures their place in the women's Final Four for the first time since 2003.
titles: Texas wins to set up SEC Final Four clash vs. S.C.

title: Pels shut down Zion, McCollum for rest of season
snippets: The New Orleans Pelicans are shutting down Zion Williamson (back) and CJ McCollum (foot) for the rest of the season.
summary: The New Orleans Pelicans have announced that players Zion Williamson, due to a back injury, and CJ McCollum, because of a foot injury, will not play for the remainder of the season.
titles: Pels shut down Zion, McCollum for rest of season

title: Trump has promised tariff ‘liberation day’. Americans aren’t so sure
snippets: Even the president’s supporters are sceptical of new levies to be imposed on trading partners on April 2
summary: Supporters of the president express doubts about the effectiveness of new trade levies set to be implemented on trading partners starting April 2.
titles: Trump has promised tariff ‘liberation day’. Americans aren’t so sure

title: Is UBS’s ‘deal of the century’ starting to sour?
snippets: The bank’s integration of Credit Suisse is going well. It’s everything else that’s the problem
summary: The bank reports that the integration of Credit Suisse is proceeding successfully. However, it is facing challenges in other areas of its operations.
titles: Is UBS’s ‘deal of the century’ starting to sour?

title: Lessons from Russia, Turkey and India for Trump’s America
snippets: Fighting for democracy can be a lonely and dangerous business
summary: Advocating for democracy often involves risks and can lead to isolation, highlighting the challenges faced by individuals who engage in this struggle.
titles: Lessons from Russia, Turkey and India for Trump’s America

title: America cannot afford to break global investor trust
snippets: Even the most powerful nation in the world needs foreign investment
summary: The statement emphasizes that even the world's most powerful country requires investment from abroad, highlighting the global interconnectedness of economies and the importance of foreign capital for economic growth and sustainability.
titles: America cannot afford to break global investor trust

title: OpenAI secures $300bn valuation after $40bn SoftBank-led funding round
snippets: Newest financing comes as ChatGPT maker seeks to become conventional for-profit company
summary: The company behind ChatGPT has secured new funding as it transitions towards becoming a traditional for-profit entity.
titles: OpenAI secures $300bn valuation after $40bn SoftBank-led funding round

title: My robot therapist: The ethics of AI mental health chatbots for kids
snippets: AI mental health apps may offer a cheap and accessible way to fill the gaps in the overstretched U.S. mental health care system, but ethics experts warn that we need to be thoughtful about how we use them, especially with children.
summary: AI mental health apps could help address the U.S. mental health care system's deficiencies by providing an affordable and accessible option. However, ethics experts caution the importance of careful consideration in their application, particularly when it comes to children.
titles: My robot therapist: The ethics of AI mental health chatbots for kids

title: Scientists pioneer method to tackle 'forever chemicals'
snippets: Researchers have developed an innovative solution to a pressing environmental challenge: removing and destroying per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS), commonly called 'forever chemicals.' A new study unveils a method that not only eliminates PFAS from water systems but also transforms waste into high-value graphene, offering a cost-effective and sustainable approach to environmental remediation.
summary: Researchers have created a method to remove 'forever chemicals' (PFAS) from water, converting the waste into valuable graphene. This sustainable solution addresses environmental concerns cost-effectively, transforming a major challenge into an opportunity for remediation.
titles: Scientists pioneer method to tackle 'forever chemicals'

title: PTSD can undermine healthy couple communication when people fear their emotions
snippets: Fear of emotions among couples with PTSD is associated with unproductive communication, according to a new study.
summary: A new study has found that couples where at least one partner has PTSD experience fear of emotions, leading to ineffective communication within the relationship.
titles: PTSD can undermine healthy couple communication when people fear their emotions

title: The proportion of harmful substances in particulate matter is much higher than assumed
snippets: People breathing contaminated air over the course of years are at greater risk of developing numerous diseases. This is thought to be due to highly reactive components in particulate matter, which affect biological processes in the body. However, researchers have now shown that precisely these components disappear within hours and that previous measurements therefore completely underestimate the quantities in which they are present.
summary: Long-term exposure to contaminated air increases the risk of various diseases due to reactive components in particulate matter affecting biological processes. Recent research indicates these components vanish within hours, suggesting prior measurements have significantly underestimated their presence.
titles: The proportion of harmful substances in particulate matter is much higher than assumed

title: Scientists solve 'cocktail party' mystery of bat echolocation
snippets: Every night, bats emerge out of roosts in massive numbers, creating what scientists have called a 'cocktail party nightmare' of clashing echolocations. Nobody knew how bats managed this severe sensorial challenge. Now, scientists have tracked bats within a group of thousands to find out: when bats first emerge from the roost, they increase their distance from the center of the group and adjust their echolocation to maneuver safely in the areas of highest bat density.
summary: Scientists discovered how bats navigate crowded spaces when emerging from roosts. By tracking thousands of bats, they found that bats increase their distance from the group's center and adjust their echolocation to avoid collisions in densely populated areas, overcoming what is known as a 'cocktail party nightmare' of overlapping echolocations.
titles: Scientists solve 'cocktail party' mystery of bat echolocation
